attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
end government hypocracy about payments to bankers when cabinet ministers 
claim housing expenses by knowingly stretching the rules.Change the rules now.The idea of a review with results published sometime in the future is a whitewash and it fools no-one. Their excuse it is not illegal has no credibility and they have no moral justification.Like FRED the SHRED the money is not being 
given back. It borders dishonesty and
the voter can send them packing come the next election.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
